name: get_transaction_count
description: Counts sales transactions for a district and year. Requires valid English district name.
whenToUse: User asks: how many transactions/كم عدد المعاملات.
User asks about number of deals/sales contracts in a place for a year.

examples.user: كم عدد المعاملات في جزيرة ياس في العام 2023؟
examples.notes: Search 'جزيرة ياس' first, then call get_transaction_count(district='YAS ISLAND', year=2023).

examples.user: How many transactions in Al Reem Island in 2024?
examples.notes: Search 'Al Reem' first to confirm exact district name.
